query: Where can I see autumn leaves?
llm_answer: You can see autumn leaves at Toshogu Shrine in Nikko, Bishamon Temple, Eikan-Do Temple, and Kiyomizu-dera Temple in Kyoto.

query: Where can I find nice lakes?
llm_answer: You can find nice lakes around Lake Chuzenji, which offers several places focusing on trout dishes and scenic views.

query: What food are a must-eat in Japan?
llm_answer: Must-eat foods in Japan include ramen, udon, curry, conveyor sushi, and omu rice. Additionally, trying local dishes at food halls, as well as experiencing a cooking lesson to make ramen, is recommended.
